actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to provide for contraceptive development and evaluation.
subjects: Abortion, Birth Control, and Family Planning

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Services Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct or to contract with the public and nonprofit private entities for the conduct of: (1) research into the development of new or improved contraceptive devices, drugs, and techniques; and (2) evaluations of the acceptance, convenience, safety, efficacy, and cost of contraceptive devices, drugs, and techniques. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986 through 1990.

titles.title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to provide for contraceptive development and evaluation.
